roleset.name: reopening of a wound, usually along suture lines
roleset.note: DEHISCE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from dehisce.01-v)

If you have a cause, it should appear as a causal phrase rather than as an arg0 type argument. I can't find examples to warrent an arg 0 but one could be added in the future if found to be possible. (from dehisce.01-v)
